citation_details.title: Assessing sensitivity to semantic and syntactic information in deaf readers: An ERP study
citation_details.author: K Emmorey, EM Akers, PM Martinez, KJ Midgley
citation_details.abstract: An ERP study by Mehravari, Emmorey, Prat, Klarman, and Osterhout (2017) found deaf and  hearing readers had similar N400 effects to semantic violations, but only hearing readers
citation_details.short_author: K Emmorey, EM Akers, PM Martinez, KJ Midgley
